text.text:
A convenient and comfortable cinema, easily accessible from Farrer Park MRT. Located within a shopping mall, it’s perfect for combining a movie with dining or shopping.

The cinema is clean and well-maintained, with good picture and sound quality. Seating is comfortable and adequate for a standard movie experience.

Snack prices are typical for cinemas, and the mall offers plenty of nearby food options. Overall, it’s a reliable spot for a casual movie outing in a relaxed, family-friendly environment.

text.text: Screen 6 here is not up to the standard required in Singapore. It’s like in coming to India Lol. Screen is much more darker than it should be. I’ve seen many movies and I know when things are not normal. Let’s see if GV will take this criticism and fix their screen 6 here in city square or are they going to ignore? Ruined the movie experience when your screen is not up to the standard and darker than it should be. Recommend people to watch at Shaw or Cathay or at GV Max instead. Screen quality here at city square is not well maintained.

text.text: Fantastic experience of the time and I have really enjoyed the movie 1917. The food was sufficient and reasonable price. The seating arrangements are good and sound was great. It was crisp and perfect to watch movie peacefully. You can come earlier and explore the market too..

text.text:
HORRENDOUS MOVIE EXPERIENCE. PERIOD.

Most of the reviews were about mall which doesn’t make sense as it’s supposed to be the cinemas. Lol.

Not a first timer here, I’ve Been here like 10+ times or more as it’s near to my place and i am a big movie buff especially in cinemas. So trust me. Every time this is a constant disappointment.

Honestly to me it’s pretty bad. The brightness, the contrast, the projection quality is very poor and pathetic. Image is so dull and blurry. I rub my eyes May times to check if problem with my eyes.
OMG Dont even ask about sound system which sucks even worse.
It’s impossible for me to comprehend to have such a low quality cinemas in rich country like this.

The Air con at late night shows r turned off or something, starts to get hot.
Cleanliness is okay. seats are not that Comfortable. Leg space is cramped.
The ticket price vs experience u get is night and day.

Overall this theatre is pretty old needs heavy upgrade of the system.
Try and avoid at all costs.

text.text: Poor service from the popcorn and snack counter. Came here for a movie, pre-ordered the food but the counter was only focused on clearing the walk-in queue. Had to walk up and force someone to serve me even though I came earlier than some that was served. If the cinema wishes to investigate further, it was on 1 mar, just after 5pm.
